name: Mulldrifter
oracle_text:
Flying
When Mulldrifter enters the battlefield, draw two cards.
Evoke {2}{U} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Merfolk Looter
oracle_text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.

name: Imprisoned in the Moon
oracle_text:
Enchant creature, land, or planeswalker
Enchanted permanent is a colorless land with "{T}: Add {C}" and loses all other card types and abilities.
flavor_text: Only one vault was great enough to hold Emrakul.

name: Forbidden Alchemy
oracle_text:
Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
Flashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Eel Umbra
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

name: Phantasmal Image
oracle_text: You may have Phantasmal Image enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's an Illusion in addition to its other types and it has "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."

name: Murder of Crows
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever another creature dies, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.
flavor_text: Even more than carrion, they crave the last words of the dying.

name: Psychic Impetus
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and is goaded. (It attacks each combat if able and attacks a player other than you if able.)
Whenever enchanted creature attacks, you scry 2.

name: Propaganda
oracle_text: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.
flavor_text:
"The cost of your opposition will be extracted from your wits."
—Nekusar, the Mindrazer

name: Prognostic Sphinx
oracle_text:
Flying
Discard a card: Prognostic Sphinx gains hexproof until end of turn. Tap it.
Whenever Prognostic Sphinx attacks, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Serum Visions
oracle_text: Draw a card. Scry 2.
flavor_text: Das Serum wurde einst aus Mirrodins Blinkmotten gewonnen und bot Visionen der Inspiration. Nun stammt es aus phyrexianischen Tintenmotten und bietet Visionen der Perfektion.

name: Riverwise Augur
oracle_text: When Riverwise Augur enters the battlefield, draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
flavor_text: "Time flows as the rivers do, toward an unknown sea. The wise know to look downstream."

name: Consuming Vapors
oracle_text:
Target player sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

name: Chittering Witch
oracle_text:
When Chittering Witch enters the battlefield, create a number of 1/1 black Rat creature tokens equal to the number of opponents you have.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.

name: Marionette Master
oracle_text:
Fabricate 3 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put three +1/+1 counters on it or create three 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.)
Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to Marionette Master's power.

name: Hex
oracle_text: Destroy six target creatures.
flavor_text: When killing five just isn't enough.

name: Gonti, Lord of Luxury
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
When Gonti, Lord of Luxury enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of target opponent's library, exile one of them face down, then put the rest on the bottom of that library in a random order. You may look at and cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.

name: Fiend of the Shadows
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Fiend of the Shadows deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles a card from their hand. You may play that card for as long as it remains exiled.
Sacrifice a Human: Regenerate Fiend of the Shadows.

name: Doomed Necromancer
oracle_text: {B}, {T}, Sacrifice Doomed Necromancer: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavor_text: Many necromancers share the same last words—the ones that conclude the undeath ritual.

name: Dead Man's Chest
oracle_text:
Enchant creature an opponent controls
When enchanted creature dies, exile cards equal to its power from the top of its owner's library. You may cast spells from among those cards for as long as they remain exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast those spells.

name: Plaguecrafter
oracle_text: When Plaguecrafter enters the battlefield, each player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. Each player who can't discards a card.
flavor_text: "My power is generosity, in a way. I give my survivors an appreciation for their lives."

name: Piper of the Swarm
oracle_text:
Rats you control have menace.
{1}{B}, {T}: Create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.
{2}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice three Rats: Gain control of target creature.
flavor_text: "If it has ears, it will dance to my tune."

name: Phthisis
oracle_text:
Destroy target creature. Its controller loses life equal to its power plus its toughness.
Suspend 5—{1}{B} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{B} and exile it with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

name: Ogre Slumlord
oracle_text:
Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.
Rats you control have deathtouch.
flavor_text:
"His tenement is filled with the most vile, disgusting vermin. It's infested with rats, too."
—Branko One-Ear

name: Necromantic Selection
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures, then return a creature card put into a graveyard this way to the battlefield under your control. It's a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types. Exile Necromantic Selection.
flavor_text: It shambled from the cloud of ash and bone dust, undeterred by its own extinction.

name: Reassembling Skeleton
oracle_text: {1}{B}: Return Reassembling Skeleton from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"They may show up with the wrong thigh bone or mandible, but they always show up."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord

name: Pontiff of Blight
oracle_text:
Extort (Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {W/B}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain that much life.)
Other creatures you control have extort. (If a creature has multiple instances of extort, each triggers separately.)

name: Victimize
oracle_text: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.
flavor_text:
"Die. But die knowing that your pathetic life will yield a great bounty for me."
—Zul Ashur, lich lord

name: Unburial Rites
oracle_text:
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
Flashback {3}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: All crave the Blessed Sleep. Few receive it.

name: Shriekmaw
oracle_text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
When Shriekmaw enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature.
Evoke {1}{B} (You may cast this spell for its evoke cost. If you do, it's sacrificed when it enters the battlefield.)

name: Anger
oracle_text:
Haste
As long as Anger is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.
flavor_text:
"Molten earth has no anger of its own. Only by infusing it with your own rage can the magma seethe and take shape."
—Koth of the Hammer

name: Bogardan Hellkite
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
When Bogardan Hellkite enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets.

name: Apex of Power
oracle_text:
Exile the top seven cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may cast spells from among them.
If this spell was cast from your hand, add ten mana of any one color.
flavor_text:
"As I desire, so it shall be."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Commune with Lava
oracle_text: Exile the top X cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
flavor_text: Atarka conquered Qadat, the Fire Rim, long ago, winning over its efreet with a promise to spread the glory of fire to all the world.

name: Chaos Warp
oracle_text: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.

name: Chain Reaction
oracle_text: Chain Reaction deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of creatures on the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"We train for the improbable, like lightning striking the same place twice, or striking everywhere at once."
—Nundari, Sea Gate militia captain

name: Dragonlord's Servant
oracle_text: Dragon spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: Atarka serving-goblins coat themselves with grease imbued with noxious herbs, hoping to discourage their ravenous masters from adding them to the meal.

name: Disrupt Decorum
oracle_text: Goad all creatures you don't control. (Until your next turn, those creatures attack each combat if able and attack a player other than you if able.)
flavor_text: Dinner and politics don't mix.

name: Dire Fleet Daredevil
oracle_text:
First strike
When Dire Fleet Daredevil enters the battlefield, exile target instant or sorcery card from an opponent's graveyard. You may cast it this turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell. If that spell would be put into a graveyard this turn, exile it instead.

name: Demanding Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
When Demanding Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 5 damage to target opponent unless that player sacrifices a creature.
flavor_text: A knight's devotion to their steed goes only so far.

name: Dark-Dweller Oracle
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card this turn. (You still pay its costs. You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)
flavor_text: Eyes are unnecessary for seeing the future.

name: Izzet Chemister
oracle_text:
Haste
{R}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard.
{1}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Izzet Chemister: Cast any number of cards exiled with Izzet Chemister without paying their mana costs.

name: Ignite the Future
oracle_text:
Exile the top three cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, you may play cards this way without paying their mana costs.
Flashback {7}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Hoard-Smelter Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
{3}{R}: Destroy target artifact. Hoard-Smelter Dragon gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is that artifact's mana value.
flavor_text: He collects the precious metals, and then converts the rest to propellant.

name: Etali, Primal Storm
oracle_text: Whenever Etali, Primal Storm attacks, exile the top card of each player's library, then you may cast any number of spells from among those cards without paying their mana costs.
flavor_text: The storm rages and the earth breaks.

name: Dragonmaster Outcast
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control six or more lands, create a 5/5 red Dragon creature token with flying.
flavor_text: "This world will be ruled by its rightful sovereigns, not these hideous pretenders."

name: Opportunistic Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
When Opportunistic Dragon enters the battlefield, choose target Human or artifact an opponent controls. For as long as Opportunistic Dragon remains on the battlefield, gain control of that permanent, it loses all abilities, and it can't attack or block.

name: Magmaquake
oracle_text: Magmaquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each planeswalker.
flavor_text:
"Where will you run when I punish you with the very ground you flee on?"
—Nicol Bolas

name: Loyal Apprentice
oracle_text:
Haste
Lieutenant — At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control your commander, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. That token gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: Those with knowledge are wise to listen to those with imagination.

name: Light Up the Stage
oracle_text:
Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Exile the top two cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
flavor_text:
"Places, everyone!"
—Judith
